title: Does the number of cells of individual strains correlate with their contribution to the total substrate turnover within a microbial community?
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,2466-2477
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00511B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Daniel Buchner, Johannes Scheckenbach, Philipp R. Martin, Stefan B. Haderlein
In a synthetic binary culture, cell numbers derived by qPCR did not reflect the contribution of individual strains to the total substrate turnover.
